message.body: When do I need to be at Ben Perry's ? I got another appt. on Wednesday morning.
I had you in there for tues-fri since you wanted today off.
I said 2 days of work . But I can come in late on Wednesday and do the whole week
Meaning we aren't going to court?
I believe so. Forwarded to you and to Tracy for some clarification.
Do I need to get the van? What's the plan for tomorrow
Give me a call when you got a sec. Too much to text.
So many buried junction boxes. U gotta check this out because it's prolly a change order to try and sort this
We are on T&M so I will just send him a photo and explain.
Just wondering if you got 1/4 " spacers
They are on the counter. They're orange.
